DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo active comparator-controlled study LY2590443 approximately 200 subject migraine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Subjects With Acute Migraines Headaches .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 65 year , inclusive . Subjects migraine headache , without aura ( diagnosis accord International Classification Headache DisordersII ) , least 1 year . Subjects 28 migraine attack average per month last 3 month ( less 15 headache day per month ) . Subjects willing able comply study schedule requirement . Subjects speak , read understand English sufficiently well willing provide write informed consent . Subjects opinion principal investigator good general health . Venous access sufficient allow blood sample per protocol . Subjects may tolerate 5HT1 agonist treatment , know hypersensitivity sumatriptan ( discussed investigator ) . Female subject positive pregnancy test screen pre dose evaluation , breastfeed . History presence significant medical illness determine investigator . Subjects current clinical diagnosis major psychiatric disease . Regular use know drug abuse ; use opiates migraine rescue ( two time per month ) permissible . Blood donation 500mL great whole blood product within 4 week study commencement , study , 4 week follow study . Investigator site personnel directly affiliate study immediate family . Immediate family define spouse , parent , child sibling , whether biological legally adopt . Consumption three unit alcohol per day one unit define 12 oz beer , 4 oz wine , 2 oz alcohol spirit liquor . Are unwilling unable comply use diary directly record data subject .
